content: Hi and thanks, you too! That sounds great. I guess it's a complex situation and the proposed solution doesn't really match things that can happen in real life...

Thank you so much for the update, happy New Year.
If the team would have something to share later, it could be very helpful. Perhaps even a good reason to change the wikipage.
Now that the challenge is inactive, maybe one of you could close this topic?
HellMap has marked this topic as resolved.
